deleteMerchant.description: Are you sure you want to delete this merchant? This action cannot be undone and all data related to this merchant will be deleted.

changeRole.title: Change Role
changeRole.description: Are you sure you want to change the role of this user? This action cannot be undone.

changeStatus.title: Change Status
changeStatus.description: Are you sure you want to change the status of this user? This action cannot be undone.
